attributes.action: ensure that MPs are housed in barracks whilst in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mps should be forced to reside in a central accomodation block whilst in London, to ensure best value for the taxpayer and to prevent excessive expenses claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
